description: Students deepen and strengthen their work in creative nonfiction. Class sessions are devoted to development of writing strategies and analysis of professional and student writing. Prerequisites: ENGL 291 or permission of the instructor.
name: Advanced Creative Nonfict
notes: Open to students who have taken a 200-level workshop in that genre or by
permission of the instructor. Any student who does not meet the requirements
will be removed from the class after registration.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: ENGL 291 or permission of the instructor.
title: Advanced Creative Nonfiction Writing Workshop
